extendedInfo.description: Play solitaire to gain yardage. Move the ball down the field to score. Watch out, your phone wont go down without a fight! Beat all challengers to become AutoBall Champion of the world!Choose between multiple modes including- vs.Mobile: Play increasingly tougher Android powered teams- vs.Self: Control both sides and always play offense- vs.Net: Play a friend over wifi. One person starts the game and gets the game code. Give your opponent the game code so they can join the game. On defense pick your opponent's offensive play selection and get blocking cards to try and end their play immediately.- Continue: Start the game now, and finish it later.

reviews.title: Needs work
reviews.comment: Unsure how to really play. At times it seems I shouldn\'t aim to get rid of all the cards... or it fumbles and throws a pick. Why? Then, all the glitches with the overtime and odd stoppage of play. Good concept, needs help. Keep working at it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Waste of time
reviews.comment: Do not install, this game totally sucks.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fun but net won\'t connect head-to head
reviews.comment: Enjoy the game but when trying to play with a friend, we can never get the NET to connect us head-to-head.  It just sits there doing nothing to connect after we enter the code to connect us.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: So Awesome
reviews.comment: Played the free version of this all day and I love the challenge to this game! It\'s worth buying and passing the time with! P. S. Enhances my football knowledge too! Thank u, Antithesis!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Pretty bad
reviews.comment: The animations are horrible and the ads will prevent you from defending most the time. This is basically a card game.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very slow load time.
reviews.comment: Took about ten seconds between every screen. Good concept tho.
